title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling Multi-Tenant SaaS Delivery with Amazon CloudFront (NET316)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon CloudFront 扩展多租户 SaaS 交付 (NET316)
abstract: Managing thousands of SaaS customer domains doesn’t have to be complex. In this session, discover how Amazon CloudFront SaaS Manager lets you deliver multi-tenant applications with speed, security - reducing operational overhead. See how to enforce security policies across every tenant, automate SSL/TLS provisioning with AWS Certificate Manager, and deliver branded, low-latency experiences worldwide. Hear from Netlify on how they deliver secure, low-latency content globally, all managed through a single unified interface serving massive SaaS customer bases with speed, reliability, and efficiency.
abstract_cn: 管理数千个 SaaS 客户域名不必复杂。在本次会议中，了解 Amazon CloudFront SaaS Manager 如何让您快速、安全地交付多租户应用程序，同时降低运营开销。了解如何在每个租户中强制执行安全策略，使用 AWS Certificate Manager 自动配置 SSL/TLS，以及在全球范围内提供品牌化的低延迟体验。听取 Netlify 分享他们如何在全球范围内交付安全、低延迟的内容，所有这些都通过单一统一界面进行管理，以速度、可靠性和效率为大规模 SaaS 客户群提供服务。

presenter.name: Sagar Desarda
presenter.title: Head of TAM & BD - Data,Analytics, GenAI ISVs
